rooms.description: The entrance hall serves as the transitional space connecting the exterior to interior spaces.
Spacious living room with natural lighting from windows aligned towards the east and north per Vastu principles.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen, designed for casual gatherings.
Modern kitchen space with ample storage and workflow optimized per Vastu alignment.
Guest bathroom with essential amenities located near the living area.
Library positioned in a quiet corner of the ground floor for reading and study, designed to enhance intellectual well-being while respecting privacy.

Windows placed strategically for natural light and ventilation, in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Transition to the central courtyard that promotes open space and a calming environment.

En-suite bathroom designed to complement the master bedroom per Vastu principles.

notes.design_principles: This design follows Brutalist aesthetics with emphasis on raw concrete finishes and geometric forms while integrating Vastu principles such as proper directional alignment, natural light distribution, and spatial harmony.
notes.building_norms: The design adheres to local building norms for a 60x90 feet plot in India, ensuring compliance with zoning regulations, structural integrity, and safety standards.
